prompt: An illustration depicting a couple sitting on a sofa, exuding a relaxed atmosphere as they gaze at each other, highlighting a serene and affectionate moment. The wife is leaning slightly to one side of the sofa, while the husband, sitting with a slight forward lean, smiles gently. The absence of background and the use of ample negative space emphasize comfort and tranquility. This image employs a minimalist Japanese line art style with simple, clean lines and no facial features. The color palette is limited to five colors: black, white, light gray, bright orange, and pale green, all set against a white background. The composition focuses on warmth and simplicity, reflecting modern illustration aesthetics without any text elements.

An illustration featuring two faceless characters facing each other, holding hands, crafted in minimalist Japanese line art. The composition is built from simple, clean lines, with each character donning clothing in distinct hues. The background remains intentionally absent, creating ample negative space that highlights the contours of the figures. The color palette exudes a soft ambiance, predominantly using shades of blue and beige. This creates a calm and serene atmosphere. The warm interaction between the figures imbues a sense of comfort to the viewer. The style is modern, employing a maximum of five colors, all set against a pristine white backdrop.
